subject: Your donation funds of $10 million us dollars.
body:
*WELCOME TO DESK OF  MRS. JANET YELLEN:United States secretary of the
treasury.U.S. Department of the Treasury.DONATION FUNDS OF $10 MILLION US
DOLLARS.Attention My Dear Friend. Mr. JamesI wish to congratulate you over
your success in our computer permit balloting sweep-stake held on 5th
December, 2023. This is a millennium scientific computer selection permit
in which email addresses and names were used. It is a promotional program
aimed at encouraging internet users. Your email address attached to ticket
number 36,5017,31,35,11, drew the lucky star numbers which consequently won
the draw in the second approved fund category. You have been approved for
the donation prize of $10 million us dollars as a donation fund.This is to
bring to you a notice that your name and your email address appeared in the
central computer ballots among the listed unpaid contract/inheritance
beneficiaries who shall receive a donation payment of $10 million US
dollars funds approved from the WORLD BANK and I.M.F OFFICE and UNITED
NATION.Note that we have 3 method options we use to distribute funds to our
customers. So therefore, You have to select any one option below on how you
will prefer to receive your donation funds of $10 million us dollars and
get back to me with your information needed in order to authorize your
donation funds of $10 million US dollars to your position.Option 1: Bank
wire transfer. ?Option 2: ATM card delivery. ?Option 3: Bank draft
check.This is the information we need from you to enable us to proceed with
your donation funds final release order to your name.Your Receivers Full
Name:Your Receivers Home Address:Your Telephone number:Your Country /
City:Your Phone Number:Note that after the registration then your donation
funds of $10 million us dollars will be released to you, Make sure you
select the option that you will receive your funds of $10 million US
dollars and get back to me, I will be waiting for your urgent reply once
you receive my mail.Your full cooperation is highly anticipated.Best
Regards,Mrs. Janet YellenThe United States secretary of the treasury : U.S.
Department of the Treasury*

subject: Attention My Dear Friend. Mr. James
body:

subject: Re: Attention My Dear Friend. Mr. James
body:
Dear Mrs. Janet Yellen,

I am delighted to hear about this unexpected donation prize of million US dollars. I would prefer to receive the funds via a bank wire transfer.

Here are my details:

Full Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Bank Name: XYZ Bank
Bank Address: 456 Bank Street, Anytown, USA
Account Number: 78901234

Please let me know if you need any additional information from me. 

Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Attention My Dear Friend. Mr. James
body:
Thank you for your mail. Please send me a copy of your ID card. Driving
license I'd or passport I'd.
